403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have necessary permission to view this resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
500.notification: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

503.title: Website is under maintenance!
503.description:
The site is not available at the moment.
We'll be back online shortly.
